column1: A funeral service will be held at the Giffin Funeral Home & Crematory in Capon Bridge
column4: 2015 at 2:30 PM. Officiating will be John Rubenstein
column5: American Legion Post #137 Chaplin. Inurnment will be private at a later date.   Family will receive friends at the funeral home on Sunday from 1PM until the service time at 2:30PM.
